data.title: Wikiwand
data.meta_description: Heo is a family name in Korea.
data.text:
For other uses, see Heo (disambiguation).

Heo is a family name in Korea.

Quick Facts Hangul, Hanja ...

Close

It is also often spelled as Hur or Huh, or less commonly as Her. In South Korea in 1985, out of a population of between roughly 40 and 45 million, there were approximately 264,000 people surnamed Heo. The name is also found in North Korea. The character used for the name (è¨±) means to permit or advocate.
